tool_description: Get shopee  E-commerce plat product and shop data(Including Thailand, Philippines, Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore, Vietnam, Taiwan, Brazil)
name: Shopee E-commerce Data
title: Shopee E-commerce Data

api_list.name: search items by keyword
api_list.description: GET search items by keyword v2

required_parameters.name: site
required_parameters.description: Optional values: my, th, vn, ph, sg, id, tw, br

optional_parameters.name: price_end
optional_parameters.description: Maximum value of price range filter

optional_parameters.name: price_start
optional_parameters.description: Minimum value of price range filter

optional_parameters.name: cat_ids
optional_parameters.description:
Category IDs, you can set single category or separate multiple ids with commas.
If you don't need to search keywords, just set 'keyword' to empty string.

api_list.name: get shop items
api_list.description: Get all items of a Shopee shop bshop id

optional_parameters.name: by
optional_parameters.description: This takes effect only when the **keyword **is not empty

get search hints

api_list.name: get product detail by id v2
api_list.description: GET product detail by 'item_id' and 'shop_id' v2

required_parameters.name: item_id
required_parameters.description: if the product url is [https://shopee.com.my/Xiaomi-Redmi-AirDots-TWS-Mi-True-Wireless-EarBuds-Basic-Earphone-Bluetooth-5.0-Bass-Voice-Control-(BLACK)-i.70413398.7041129024?ads_keyword=wkdaelpmissisiht&adsid=10115290&campaignid=5587639&position=120](url),then the item_id is 7041129024,shop_id is 70413398

required_parameters.name: site
required_parameters.description: Optional values: my, th, vn, ph, sg, id, tw, br

required_parameters.name: shop_id
required_parameters.description: if the product url is [https://shopee.com.my/Xiaomi-Redmi-AirDots-TWS-Mi-True-Wireless-EarBuds-Basic-Earphone-Bluetooth-5.0-Bass-Voice-Control-(BLACK)-i.70413398.7041129024?ads_keyword=wkdaelpmissisiht&adsid=10115290&campaignid=5587639&position=120](url),then the item_id is 7041129024,shop_id is 70413398
